citation_details.title: What are you talking about? Representation of the Topic of Speech in the Human Brain
citation_details.author: A Boncz, B Toth, I Winkler
citation_details.abstract: A sentence outside the context provides very restricted information to the listener. Real  understanding requires one to be able to place it within the sequence of sentences forming a
citation_details.short_author: A Boncz, B Toth, I Winkler
